title: For Investors, Discovering Truth Takes Time - Ep 19
itunes:title: For Investors, Discovering Truth Takes Time - Ep 19
description:
"Time discovers truth," said Seneca – and he may have been speaking about the market (if by "truth" he meant "accurate valuation"). Listen to Vitaliy explain why.

You can read this article online at: https://contrarianedge.com/investors-discovering-truth-takes-time/

Disclosure: Read this before you buy your next stock
